name: Holes Of Hell
description:
A game about dead Josh. Poor man must discover how to get to heaven or hell.

In the end it became one day project becouse my first try got corrupted on friday. I almost gave up but then i created at least demo of it :)

Controls: Movement: WSAD

                      Get to Menu by pressing ESC

Ps: Music and sounds made for me my friend MrSentry and FanArt made my friend Hesik
